subject: p13473781
History: -year-old female with history of chest pain.
Findings: Frontal and lateral views of the chest were obtained. Severely enlarged cardiac silhouette is again seen. Small left greater than right pleural effusions remain. Mediastinal and hilar contours are similar. No displaced fracture is seen.
Impression: No displaced fracture, however, if clinical concern for fracture persists of the ribs, suggest dedicated rib series, which is more sensitive. Persistent severe enlargement of the cardiac silhouette and small bilateral pleural effusions.
